import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000';// Create axios instance specifically for auth
const authAPI=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,withCredentials:true,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});const authService={login:async credentials=>{try{const res=await authAPI.post('/api/auth/login',credentials);console.log('Login response:',res.data);return res.data.user;}catch(error){var _error$response;console.error('Login error:',((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.data)||error.message);throw error;}},signup:async data=>{try{const res=await authAPI.post('/api/auth/signup',data);console.log('Signup response:',res.data);return res.data;}catch(error){var _error$response2;console.error('Signup error:',((_error$response2=error.response)===null||_error$response2===void 0?void 0:_error$response2.data)||error.message);throw error;}},getCurrentUser:async()=>{try{const res=await authAPI.get('/api/auth/profile');return res.data;}catch(error){var _error$response3;console.log('Get current user failed:',(_error$response3=error.response)===null||_error$response3===void 0?void 0:_error$response3.status);throw error;}},logout:async()=>{try{await authAPI.post('/api/auth/logout');}catch(error){console.error('Logout error:',error);}},getAllUsers:async()=>{const res=await authAPI.get('/api/auth/users');return res.data.users;},deleteUser:async userId=>{await authAPI.delete("/api/auth/users/".concat(userId));},updateProfile:async data=>{await authAPI.put('/api/auth/profile',data);}};export default authService;
